column3: â€œGreat taste and hard hitting high!â€

â€œI felt a really strong, lingering body high with this one. Very tingly and euphoric. The head high crept in a little later and was just a nice creative and happy high without being overwhelming. Love the citrus scent and flavor when smoked.â€

â€œHad this from The Bluebird coffeeshop in Amsterdam with my boyfriend a few days ago. I can confidently say that it was the nicest bud I've ever had. I prefer sativa strains, and this one was recommended by the girl behind the counter. As I said I had it with my boyfriend. We didn't feel like couch potatoes, we explored the city with smiles on our faces and we enjoyed the euphoria. It tasted lovely, and kept us uplift...â€
â€œLime haze is a sativa strain that tastes like a Mexican restaurant. Sorta like corona with lime or chips and salsa with lime.â€

â€œExceptional strain,  im an over thinker which gives me anxiety and so when i get high often i think more but this strain is amazing all my anxietys gone,  clear as well,  can move around and perform tasks. Great taste,  very sweet,  unusual citrussy smell,  very niceâ€

â€œOooo this may be a new under-the-radar classic! Very little known about this strain but I received a batch and itâ€™s phenomenal!! The buds look like textbook indica, dark green with dark orange fibres laced throughout, and the high is the perfect 50/50 which leads me to say this is actually an Hybrid. It smells like grass, reminding me of classic, highschool weed and the high has been nostalgic af! Donâ€™t let this regu...â€

â€œThis strain was great for the first week, then it seemed to lose all of its potency and allure.

In the beginning, it was very fragrant and gave a fairly intense head high that lasted for a few hours.

After the first week, though, it didn't seem to have the same punch that it once had. We found ourselves needing more medicine for the same desired effect.

The fragrance was nice, a very clean citrus scent with a hint...â€

â€œIllinois THC rating at 22%. I really like this strain for every day use. It will up lift u and leave you energized for most of the day. It's really light with a great flavor I personally use it for headache relief.â€

It smells like grass, reminding me of classic, highschool weed and the high has been nostalgic af! Donâ€™t let this regu...â€
â€œvery smooth , wasn't too heavy , and very nice cerebral effectâ€

â€œExtremely dank/pungent smell. Filled my room almost instantly when I opened it. Bud looks really nice, crystals and orange hairs upon close inspection. The smell could be a little better though, as it doesn't match the obvious lime smell of the flower. I give this a 4/5â€
â€œPhenomenal strain! I would highly recommend breaking it up with your bare thumbs instead of grinding it up bc the tricomes on it enhance the experience 10xâ€

â€œit was amazing.one of the sweetest
 strain I've had so farâ€

â€œI got some fresh fire of this and 1 hit kicked my ass for a few.  I have smoked for years!  I like the lime skittle taste with chem... not too bad.  Regular looking, burn, and overall a good strain.â€
â€œ3.5 ğŸŒŸ (needs to be out of 10 leafly) itâ€™s unexpectedly & surprisingly tasty but not as good as Amnesia Haze for me personally.â€

â€œGreat haze cross! Nice size buds, leaving a lot of hash on grind, which is awesome! Relaxing and pleasant for a Sativa. Easy to hit, hits back even harder. Nice for pain, better for killing anxiety!â€
â€œPungent smell, smoke smells a little different though. Bud had orange hairs and crystallized.â€

â€œA touch of lime flavor is nice on the nose.  This Hybrid Sativa is enough to give you an energy boost by not too much that your eyes water and you have enough energy to run a marathon (although those are great at times).

Drying and Curing spot on!â€
â€œLime Haze is excellent for expand your creativity and relaxing. Also improves my concentration and focus.â€
â€œsmelled and tasted amazing and had a kick ass body high!â€
â€œoutstanding fragrance. well-defined citrus aftertaste.â€
â€œOne of my favorites so far, very happy and high.energy,  I smiled a lotâ€
â€œThis strain really helped me with nausea.  It was an all around great herb.â€
â€œReceived some from 2020 Solutions. It smells exactly like lime and has a very strong head high that hits you like a bus.â€
â€œBEAUTIFUL BUDS WITH A STRONG LIMEADE SMELL.â€
â€œAmazing flavor! Key lime on the dot.â€

â€œBeautiful sweet buds, large and dense with vibrant orange hairs. The buds smelled strongly of Lime, and the smoke even had a lime after taste. The bud was very strong and gave a huge head high. In my experience it was a bit too intense. My body felt tingly and I felt a little bit anxious and paranoid. If smoked in a lower quantity I could definitely see this strain being used to treat depression and to handle stress.â€
â€œAmazing. The only negative comment I would leave, is that it made me a little nauseated. But great taste, great high.â€
â€œvery frosty, potent smell, great smoke.â€
â€œI'm glad I tried this strain. Very tasty and surprisingly potent. Nice citrus component as expected. I'll buy this again.â€
